title: Computational Creativity: A Philosophical Approach, and an Approach to Philosophy

The first approach is vector space models.
Vector space models are vector spaces or high dimensional structures that correspond to concepts.
So you have a conceptual object that has a corresponding vector in each of the dimensions of this vector corresponds to its contextual relationship to similar concepts.
For instance, in natural language processing this has been done by analyzing the distribution of words.
